        public boolean positionIsPrincess​(Position position)

        Returns:

      • positionIsDoor

        public boolean positionIsDoor​(Position position)
        This function is used to know that there is a door at a given position Useful for example for the monsters which can't go on a door position or for the player to know if he is in front of a door to open it
        Parameters:
        position - the given position
        Returns:
        if there is a door or not

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty​(Position position)

      • canExplode

        public boolean canExplode​(Position p)
        Parameters:
        p - the position that we would like to explose
        Returns:
        if this position could explose (if there is an object which can't explose or if the position is outside, return false. Otherwise, return true)

      • explode

        public boolean explode​(Position p)
        Parameters:
        p - the position that we need to explose.
        Returns:
        if something has exploded at this position

      • canBomb

        public boolean canBomb​(Position p)

      • canScarecrow

        public boolean canScarecrow​(Position p)
        Function used to know if it is possible to put a scarecrow in the world (The only constraint of the scarecrow besides bombs is that it can have two scarecrows on the world)
        Parameters:
        p - the position in which we would like to put a scarecrow
        Returns:
        if it is possible to put here a scarecrow

      • hasScarecrow

        public boolean hasScarecrow()
        Returns:
        if there is already a scarecrow on the world

      • getScarecrowPosition

        public Position getScarecrowPosition()
        Returns:
        the actual position of the scarecrow, or null if there is not any scarecrow

      • getScarecrow

        public Scarecrow getScarecrow()
        Returns:
        the scarecrow of the world, or null if there is not any scarecrow

        Parameters:
        position - the given position
        Returns:
        if it is possible to go here or not
